cards.rulesText: This fighter is a Quarry. If this fighter is a Quarry, this fighter is on Guard.

cards.name: Trophy Belt
cards.colourText: 'Stop squirming, runt, that head will look better hanging from my belt than it does squatting between your scrawny shoulders.' - Hrothgorn
cards.rulesText: Gain 1 spent glory point when this fighter's Attack action takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action. Gain 1 unspent glory point instead if the target was a Quarry.

cards.name: Furious Reprisal
cards.colourText: 'If dey stikk ya, den stikk 'em right back!' - Rippa Narkbad
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this after an enemy fighter's Attack action that targeted a friendly fighter. That friendly fighter makes an Attack action that must target that enemy fighter, and you can re-roll any number of dice in the attack roll.

cards.name: Hamstring
cards.colourText: A quick and vicious snap of the fangs, and the prey is left limping and at bay.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's successful Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action. Give the target of that Attack action one Move token.

cards.name: Narrow Escape
cards.colourText: The luck of Mork, or a healthy dose of life-preserving paranoia? The results are the same, either way.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this when a friendly fighter is dealt damage, before placing wound tokens on their fighter card. Reduce that damage by 1, to a minimum of 1.

cards.name: Pack Tactics
cards.colourText: The Gitmobs are renowned for mobbing their victims. After all, no grot likes a fair fight.
cards.rulesText: Choose one friendly fighter and up to two friendly fighters adjacent to that fighter. Push each chosen fighter 1 hex.

cards.name: Savage Mauling
cards.colourText: 'Get these pox-damned curs off me! Nyaargh!' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: The first Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice and +1 Damage for each supporting friendly fighter.

cards.name: Smell Weakness
cards.colourText: The Gitmobs like nothing better than wounded and weakened prey.
cards.rulesText: The first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has Cleave and Ensnare if the target has one or more wound tokens.

cards.name: Defensive Manoeuvre
cards.colourText: 'Stikk 'em quick, then leg it good. That's how da Gitmobs fight.' - Stabbit
cards.rulesText: Choose one friendly fighter. Push that fighter up to 1 hex away from the nearest enemy fighter. Give the friendly fighter one Guard token.

cards.name: Unbridled Ferocity
cards.colourText: 'Once a snarlfang has sunk its jaws into its victim, it locks them in place and whips its head right and left, tearing out great chunks of flesh.' - Osclephius' Ghurish Bestiary, vol. XI
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's failed Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action. That fighter makes a Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action.

cards.name: Venomous Spittle
cards.colourText: 'On the open plains, snarlfangs hobble their prey then stalk them for days as their wounds fester and their strength fades. It works in battle, too.' - Osclephius' Ghurish Bestiary, vol. XI
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's successful Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action. The target of that Attack action is dealt 1 damage at the end of each action phase. This effect persists until the target is out of action.

cards.name: Vindictive Attack
cards.colourText: 'We hunt 'em coz we hate 'em.' - Mean-eye
cards.rulesText: +2 Dice to the first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation

cards.name: Bonded
cards.colourText: Gitmob grots steal snarlfang pups from their dens before the creatures' eyes have even opened. They raise them, and so bond with them, in their own cruel and spiteful fashion.
cards.rulesText: When this fighter makes an Attack action that targets an adjacent enemy fighter, or is the target of an Attack action made by an adjacent enemy fighter, this fighter is considered to have one additional supporting fighter.

cards.name: Boss Hat
cards.colourText: 'I'm wearing da boss 'at now, and I sez wot goes!' - Stabbit
cards.rulesText: If your leader is out of action:

cards.name: Circling Hunter
cards.colourText: 'Just coz dey slunk off inta the shadowz, don't mean dey'z gone far. Stay sharp, ladz.' - Morgok
cards.rulesText: Reaction: After this fighter's Attack action (but not during a superaction) or after an Attack action that targets this fighter (but not during a superaction), push this fighter 1 hex.

cards.name: Embittered Survivor
cards.colourText: You can tell a veteran of the Gitmobs from the scars between his shoulder blades.
cards.rulesText: +1 Wounds

cards.name: Fiendish Jab
cards.colourText: 'Hahaa! Right in the eye, ya zogger! 'Ow d'ya like dat?' - Stabbit
cards.rulesText: +1 Damage to this fighter's Stabbin' Stikka Attack action for each in the attack roll

cards.name: Hidden Slitta
cards.colourText: 'I keeps dis 'andy fer close encounterz.' - Mean-eye

cards.name: Hunt as One
cards.colourText: 'They are cruel, spiteful and crude, but by the spirits they know how to hunt.' - Sheoch
cards.rulesText: When this fighter supports a friendly fighter, this fighter is considered to be two supporting fighters.

cards.name: Loping Strides
cards.colourText: 'With their long-legged gait and remarkable stamina, snarlfangs can cross great distances at speed.' - Osclephius' Ghurish Bestiary, vol. XI
cards.rulesText: +2 Move

cards.name: Pack Leader
cards.colourText: The alpha snarlfang is always the biggest, and has the most vicious bite.
cards.rulesText: You can re-roll any number of dice in this fighter's attack rolls for the Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action.

cards.name: Quickdrop Venom
cards.colourText: While not as prolific poisoners as their Moonclan cousins, the Gitmobs know how to brew a suitably lethal draught.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: After this fighter's successful Attack action (other than a Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action), roll one attack dice. On a or the target of that Attack action is dealt 1 damage.

cards.name: Burning Spite
cards.colourText: Rivalry is a powerful motivator amongst the Gitmobs.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if two or more surviving friendly fighters are Inspired.

cards.name: Chase Down
cards.colourText: 'At pursuit's end, with their prey cornered and exhausted, the snarlfangs close in for the kill.' - Osclephius' Ghurish Bestiary, vol. XI
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if two or more friendly fighters are adjacent to the same enemy fighter.

cards.name: Conquered Land
cards.colourText: Cavern by cavern, tunnel by tunnel, the Gitmobs conquer Beastgrave as they would the tribal kingdoms of the Ghurish plains.
cards.rulesText: Score this in end phase if your warband holds all objectives in one or more players' territories.

cards.name: Cruel Hunters
cards.colourText: 'Run 'em down. Pick 'em off. Make 'em bleed...' - Rippa Narkbad
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Feeding Time
cards.colourText: Nothing keeps a snarlfang loyal like a ready supply of fresh red meat.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a friendly fighter's Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action.

cards.name: Lay Waste
cards.colourText: In Ghur, if you are not a predator then you are prey, and prey never lasts very long.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if all enemy fighters are out of action.

cards.name: Leading the Charge
cards.colourText: The bosses of the Gitmobs walk a fine line, leading from the front while forever watching their backs.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after your leader makes a successful Attack action as part of a Charge action.

cards.name: Loaded with Plunder
cards.colourText: Looting enough of the enemy's shinies goes a long way towards proving who deserves to be 'da boss'.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if one or more friendly fighters have three or more upgrades.

cards.name: Marking Your Territory
cards.colourText: When you've got to go, you've got to go...
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

cards.name: No Mercy
cards.colourText: The only thing quicker to scent blood than a snarlfang is the grot riding it.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful Attack action that targeted an enemy fighter with one or more wound tokens.

cards.name: Plunderers
cards.colourText: 'Stab da gitz den grab their glitz!' - Stabbit
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter has one or more upgrades.

cards.name: Swift Hunters
cards.colourText: The Gitmobs sweep down upon their foes like the fire-winds of the open plains.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if three or more surviving friendly fighters each have one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

cards.name: Adaptive Tactics
cards.colourText: Trained relentlessly in the grand Gladitorium of Azyrheim, Stormcast Eternals are prepared for any battle.
cards.rulesText: Draw up to one objective card and up to one power card, and then discard one objective card.

cards.name: Champions of Sigmar
cards.colourText: None can stand before the God-King's finest.
cards.rulesText: The first Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has Innate ().

cards.name: Fulminating Blast
cards.colourText: A spear of lightning smashes down from the heavens, driving back the unrighteous.
cards.rulesText: Push an enemy fighter up to one hex.

cards.name: Improvised Blow
cards.colourText: Blades and hammers are not the only deadly weapons of the Stormcast Eternals.
cards.rulesText: Choose a friendly fighter adjacent to an enemy fighter. The chosen fighter makes the following Attack action.

cards.name: Inevitable Blow
cards.colourText: When the fates align there is nothing that can impede a warrior's killing strike.
cards.rulesText: Pick Cleave or Ensnare. The first Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has that ability.

cards.name: Outflank
cards.colourText: 'Tavian, to the left! Strike from the flank!' - Gwynne Ironsoul
cards.rulesText: Choose a friendly fighter adjacent to another fighter and push them up to two hexes.

cards.name: Steadfast
cards.colourText: The warriors of the God-King stand firm in the face of the daemonic and the undead.
cards.rulesText: Choose a friendly fighter and give them a Guard token.

cards.name: Thunderous Smite
cards.colourText: An eruption of thunderous force sends the Sequitors' foes reeling.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this during a friendly fighter's Range 1 Attack action that will succeed, before the deal damage step. In that step, instead of dealing damage equal to the Damage characteristic of the Attack action, the target is dealt 1 damage and each enemy fighter adjacent to the target is dealt 1 damage.

cards.name: Unyielding Resolve
cards.colourText: Only the surest blow can strike down a Stormcast Eternal.
cards.rulesText: Choose a friendly fighter and roll a defence dice. On a roll of or , Heal (2) that fighter, otherwise Heal (1) that fighter.

cards.name: Vengeful Strike
cards.colourText: 'Every outrage shall be repaid a hundredfold.' - Gwynne Ironsoul
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this during an enemy fighter's Attack action that deals damage to an adjacent friendly fighter, before the drive back step. Roll an attack dice. On a roll of or the friendly fighter is not driven back and makes an Attack action that targets the attacker.

cards.name: Aetherically Charged Shield
cards.colourText: Sigmar's storm can defend as well as destroy.
cards.rulesText: You can re-roll one dice in each defence roll made for this fighter.

cards.name: Aetherically Charged Weapon
cards.colourText: This weapon resonates with celestial power.
cards.rulesText: You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll of the first Attack action this fighter makes in each round.

cards.name: Consecrated Pendant
cards.colourText: This amulet bears a powerful arcane ward.
cards.rulesText: +1 Wounds

cards.name: Enchanted Robes
cards.colourText: Sequitor robes often carry defensive enchantments of their own.
cards.rulesText: +1 Move

cards.name: Hallowed Aura
cards.colourText: This warrior is so suffused with holy power that their wounds heal almost instantly.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: After an Attack action that deals damage to this fighter, roll an attack dice. On a roll of or Heal (1) this fighter.

cards.name: Punishing Blow
cards.colourText: 'I deliver unto you the God-King's justice.'
cards.rulesText: After a fighter makes this Attack action, discard this card.

cards.name: Sanctified Armour
cards.colourText: This battle-plate has been blessed with the blood of saints.
cards.rulesText: When this fighter is dealt damage, reduce that damage by 1, to a minimum of 1.

cards.name: Soul-hardened Shield
cards.colourText: Powerful magic empowers this shield.
cards.rulesText: When this fighter is activated, before making an action with them, give them a Guard token.

cards.name: Spirit Flask
cards.colourText: Sacrosanct warriors carry consecrated flasks that, when broken, release a blast of powerful spirit energy.
cards.rulesText: Action: Choose one: Deal 1 damage to an adjacent enemy fighter, or Heal (2) this fighter. Discard this card.

cards.name: Stoic Stance
cards.colourText: Rooting themselves with aetheric magic, this warrior becomes as immovable as a mountain.
cards.rulesText: This fighter cannot be driven back.

cards.name: Call of the Grave
cards.colourText: 'Come closer, my child...' - Widow Caitha
cards.rulesText: Choose an enemy fighter and push them up to two hexes towards a friendly fighter.

cards.name: Chilling Scream
cards.colourText: Those that hear the bone-chilling cry of a Myrmourn Banshee never forget the sound.
cards.rulesText: Your opponents cannot play power cards. This persists until the end of the power step.

cards.name: Dissipate
cards.colourText: Trying to destroy the near-immaterial Nighthaunt is difficult at best.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action, before the attack roll. Choose a friendly fighter. That fighter gains Innate (). This persists until the Attack action ends or until that friendly fighter is taken out of action.

cards.name: Echoing Spite
cards.colourText: 'Pierce their hearts and drink deep of their sorrow!' - The Anguished One
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Range 1 Attack action that fails. That fighter makes that Attack action again.

cards.name: Enervating Sorrow
cards.colourText: 'I... can't... go on...' - Brodus Blightbane
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this when an opponent plays a ploy, before that ploy is resolved. That opponent can discard a power card. If they do not, the ploy is not resolved.

cards.name: Frightful Aspect
cards.colourText: To look upon the face of a Myrmourn Banshee is to be struck by the purest terror.
cards.rulesText: Push an enemy fighter up to one hex.

cards.name: Shared Agony
cards.colourText: 'Soon you will feel the same pain as I do.' - The Screaming Maiden
cards.rulesText: Choose a friendly fighter with one or more wound tokens and an enemy fighter adjacent to them. Heal (1) the friendly fighter. The enemy fighter is dealt 1 damage.

cards.name: Soaring Spite
cards.colourText: There is no quarry that the incorporeal Myrmourn Banshees cannot reach.
cards.rulesText: Double the Move characteristic of the first friendly fighter to make a Move action (not as part of a Charge action) in the next activation.

cards.name: Spectral Charge
cards.colourText: Myrmourn Banshees strike with terrifying speed and viciousness.
cards.rulesText: +1 Damage to the first Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

cards.name: Spectral Grasp
cards.colourText: 'There is no escape for thee.' - Lady Harrow
cards.rulesText: Reduce the Move characteristic of the first fighter to be activated in the next activation by the number of friendly fighters that are out of action, to a minimum of 0.

cards.name: Arcane Siphon
cards.colourText: The Myrmourn voraciously devour arcane energies, robbing enchanted weapons of their magic.
cards.rulesText: Action: Choose one enemy fighter within three hexes of this fighter. Pick one of that fighter's upgrades. That upgrade is discarded. Roll an attack dice. On a roll of or discard this card.

cards.name: Debilitating Aura
cards.colourText: The radiating grave-chill of a Banshee robs the strength from those nearby.
cards.rulesText: The Attack actions of adjacent enemy fighters have -1 Dice (to a minimum of 1).

cards.name: Gravesand Glass
cards.colourText: 'Thou art mine for evermore.' - Lady Harrow
cards.rulesText: Reaction: After an Attack action or ploy that takes an enemy fighter out of action, Heal (1) this fighter.

cards.name: Hollow Hatred
cards.colourText: Entirely shorn of mercy or compassion, Banshees are creatures of pure malice.
cards.rulesText: You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll of the first Attack action this fighter makes in each round.

cards.name: Maddening Hunger
cards.colourText: Myrmourn Banshees are cursed with a hunger for magical essence that can never be sated.
cards.rulesText: This fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions have +1 Dice if they have a Charge token.

cards.name: Soul Harvest
cards.colourText: The swirling energies of death reinvigorate the fighter.
cards.rulesText: Action: If one or more enemy fighters are out of action, Heal (1) this fighter, and give this fighter a Guard token.

cards.name: Soul Leech
cards.colourText: The merest touch of a Banshee saps the spirit.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: After this fighter makes a Move action, roll an attack dice. On a roll of or the first enemy fighter they moved through in that Move action is dealt 1 damage.

cards.name: Spirit Blade
cards.colourText: This blade feeds upon the souls of the slain.
cards.rulesText: While one or more enemy fighters are out of action, this fighter has the following Attack action:

cards.name: Swooping Dash
cards.colourText: With a fearsome scream the Banshee swoops down upon its victim.
cards.rulesText: +2 Move

cards.name: Veil of Grief
cards.colourText: This ethereal drape imbues its wearer with unholy fortitude.
cards.rulesText: +1 Wounds

cards.name: Aetheric Mastery
cards.colourText: The warriors of the Sacrosanct Chambers are suffused with the fury of Sigmar's Tempest.
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Forceful Banishment
cards.colourText: 'Begone, servant of evil!' - Tavian of Sarnassus
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is driven back by a friendly fighter's Attack action that has the Knockback ability.

cards.name: Martial Prowess
cards.colourText: 'Our foes outnumber us once again. Perhaps we should fight blindfolded, to even the odds?' - Brodus Blightbane
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after your warband makes a third or subsequent successful Attack action in the same phase.

cards.name: Sacrosanct Purge
cards.colourText: The storm-enchanted maces of the Sequitors blast through metal and ethereal matter with equal ease.
cards.rulesText: Score this an end phase if two or more enemy fighters were taken out of action in this round.

cards.name: Sally Forth
cards.colourText: 'There is a time for the shield and a time for the hammer.' - Gwynne Ironsoul
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if there are two or more friendly fighters adjacent to each other in enemy territory.

cards.name: Stormforged Heroes
cards.colourText: Each Stormcast Eternal is a champion of formidable might, a warrior forged to battle horrors that mortal-kind could not face.
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Strength in Unity
cards.colourText: Sequitors fight as a single devastating entity, with each warrior playing a vital role.
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Uncontested Might
cards.colourText: 'None can stand before the righteous.' - Gwynne Ironsoul
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

cards.name: Vengeance Satisfied
cards.colourText: The screams of routed foes make for a most stirring choir.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if more than half of the fighters in one or more enemy warbands are out of action.

cards.name: Vindicated Arrogance
cards.colourText: 'Come then, fiends. The storm awaits.' - Gwynne Ironsoul
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your leader was the target of one or more Attack actions in this round and is on the battlefield.

cards.name: Wrathful Blow
cards.colourText: With a single furious blow the foe is sundered.
cards.rulesText: Surge, Dual: Score this immediately

cards.name: Your Turn!
cards.colourText: The strike of a shield can leave a foe reeling and helpless for a comrade's killing strike.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is driven back into a hex adjacent to a friendly fighter.

cards.name: Bitter Embrace
cards.colourText: The Nighthaunts seek not to merely to kill, but to subject their victims to the same horrors that define their cursed existence.
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Creeping Dread
cards.colourText: The dead do not cease their grim march until they have scoured all life from the land.
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Dominion of Death
cards.colourText: 'They're everywhere!' - Tavian of Sarnassus
cards.rulesText: Score this in the third end phase if you have scored the most objective cards.

cards.name: Fleeting Memories
cards.colourText: 'Have I walked these grounds before?' - The Anguished One
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter finishes a Move action and entered two or more different hexes that contained an objective during that Move action.

cards.name: Frozen in Place
cards.colourText: Terror can transfix even the bravest souls.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if one or more enemy fighters each have one or more Guard tokens.

cards.name: Ghostly Torment
cards.colourText: Myrmourn Banshees hate the living as much as they despise themselves.
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Inescapable Hunger
cards.colourText: 'Nowhere to hide, nowhere to flee, the Lady in Rags, she comes for thee.' - Lethisian nursery rhyme
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter makes a Move action through one or more blocked hexes and ends that Move action adjacent to an enemy fighter.

cards.name: Nagash's Tithe
cards.colourText: When death is on the wind, Myrmourn Banshees surge forth like a flock of carrion birds.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if there are more enemy fighters out of action than friendly fighters out of action.

cards.name: Nexus of Terror
cards.colourText: 'This city belongs to Nagash. All of it.' - Widow Caitha
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds the most objectives.

cards.name: One Will
cards.colourText: 'All in accordance with His will.' - Lady Harrow
cards.rulesText: Surge, Dual: Score this immediately

cards.name: Spectral Vortex
cards.colourText: The Nighthaunt attack as a swirling hurricane of spectral force that envelops the foe.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is the target of a second or subsequent successful Attack action in this phase, and each Attack action was made by a different friendly fighter.

cards.name: Tide of Malice
cards.colourText: The hateful Nighthaunt sweep forth, drawing strength from the terror of their prey.
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Bold Conquest
cards.colourText: Great leaders are trailblazers, inspiring examples for those who follow them.
cards.rulesText: Surge, Dual: Score this immediately after an activation

cards.name: Concerted Attack
cards.colourText: Choose your target and put them down. Mercilessly.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after a third or subsequent friendly fighter makes an Attack action that targets the same enemy fighter in this phase.

cards.name: Cover Ground
cards.colourText: Speed is of the essence.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter makes a Move action in which they enter 6 or more hexes.

cards.name: Finders of the Way
cards.colourText: If you mean to follow the path to victory, you must first unlock the gates that bar it.
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Guardians of the Way
cards.colourText: 'Your journey ends at my blade, fiend.' - Sheoch
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Plant a Standard
cards.colourText: The boldest leaders stake their claim upon the battlefield.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your leader is holding an objective in enemy territory.

cards.name: Steadfast Defender
cards.colourText: 'Grraah, skraagahh!' - Gristlewel (Trans: I shall hold this post unto my last breath!)
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter holding an objective, if that fighter is still holding that objective.

cards.name: Tactical Genius 1-3
cards.colourText: The treasures of Beastgrave are not easily claimed.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objectives 1, 2 and 3.

cards.name: Tactical Genius 3-5
cards.colourText: 'A perfectly coordinated strike, my sisters.' - Morgwaeth the Bloodied
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objectives 3, 4 and 5.

cards.name: Tactical Supremacy 1-2
cards.colourText: Own the landscape, and you will own victory.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objectives 1 and 2.

cards.name: Tactical Supremacy 3-4
cards.colourText: A great tactician knows where to deploy his strength.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objectives 3 and 4.

cards.name: Victorious Duel
cards.colourText: 'Who's da boss?' - Morgok
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when your leader's Attack action takes an enemy leader out of action.

cards.name: Daylight Robbery
cards.colourText: 'It was here a moment ago!'
cards.rulesText: Roll one attack dice. On a roll of or take 1 unspent glory point from one opponent.

cards.name: Distraction
cards.colourText: A moment's doubt can last a lifetime in Beastgrave.
cards.rulesText: Choose one enemy fighter and push them 1 hex.

cards.name: Forward Planning
cards.colourText: 'I fort this might come in handy...' - Quiv
cards.rulesText: Choose one friendly fighter with no Charge tokens. Give that fighter one Charge token and one upgrade.

cards.name: Harnessed Power
cards.colourText: A strong mind can call upon the power of the countless lives that Beastgrave has taken.
cards.rulesText: Heal (1) each fighter that is holding an objective.

cards.name: Jealous Defence
cards.colourText: 'I found it, it's mine!' - Kyrae
cards.rulesText: Choose one friendly fighter with no Charge tokens holding an objective. The chosen fighter makes one Attack action.

cards.name: Mischievous Spirits
cards.colourText: Mysterious entities burst from the ground, leaving chaos and confusion in their wake.

cards.name: Misdirection
cards.colourText: Trickery can sometimes win the day when might alone cannot.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this when a friendly fighter is chosen by a ploy. Choose another friendly fighter that could be chosen by that ploy. That fighter is chosen instead.

cards.name: No Time
cards.colourText: Time has many paths. Some are dead ends.
cards.rulesText: Power cards cannot be played until after the next activation.

cards.name: Rebound
cards.colourText: 'Waaa- Argh!' - Ardskull
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this during an enemy fighter's Attack action, after the defence roll, if that Attack action would succeed. Roll one defence dice. On a roll of or the attacker is dealt damage equal to the Damage characteristic of the Attack action, and the combat sequence ends.

cards.name: Spectral Wings
cards.colourText: Soar on the blood-hot winds of battle.
cards.rulesText: +2 Move to the first fighter to make a Move action in the next activation.

cards.name: Grim Tenacity
cards.colourText: 'I ain't goin' nowhere ya git, so it's yooz or me. And it ain't me.' - Rippa Narkbad
cards.rulesText: This fighter cannot be driven back.

cards.name: Guardian Glaive
cards.colourText: 'No blade is keener than that wielded in defence of a noble cause.' - Althaen

cards.name: Lender's Lockbox
cards.colourText: It keeps things safe. But it's not safe.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: After this fighter is removed from the battlefield, pick one of their upgrades and return it to your hand.

cards.name: Shardcaller
cards.colourText: 'Your... trophy. Mine!' - Grashrak
cards.rulesText: At the beginning of each action phase, you can pick one objective held by this fighter and one other objective, then place each objective you picked in the hex that contained the other objective.

cards.name: The Blazing Key
cards.colourText: Whoever would hope to rule Beastgrave must possess this key, which unlocks the secrets of the Throne of Tusks.
cards.rulesText: If this fighter is holding objective 3 in the third end phase, gain 2 glory points.

cards.name: The Dazzling Key
cards.colourText: This key was forged to trammel the power of the Gargant's Blade. Though that mighty blade was freed long ago, the key still resonates with its power.
cards.rulesText: If this fighter is holding objective 4 in the third end phase, gain 2 glory points.

cards.name: The Formless Key
cards.colourText: The God of Death forged a key, a formless wisp of soul matter and darkest magic, and with it he unlocked Shadespire's wards and released the Katophrane Curse.
cards.rulesText: If this fighter is holding an objective in the third end phase, gain 1 glory point.

cards.name: The Fractured Key
cards.colourText: Some claim this ancient key is an artefact of the Silent People. Others hold that it was forged to bind that race to Beastgrave for eternity.
cards.rulesText: If this fighter is holding objective 5 in the third end phase, gain 2 glory points.

cards.name: The Hallowed Key
cards.colourText: Only the howl-horn's reverberating note can unlock the primal power of this key.
cards.rulesText: If this fighter is holding objective 1 in the third end phase, gain 2 glory points.

cards.name: The Shadowed Key
cards.colourText: Boneclav, Shadefetter, Amberbond - this key has many names, but only one purpose.
cards.rulesText: If this fighter is holding objective 2 in the third end phase, gain 2 glory points.

cards.name: Blades of Putrefaction
cards.colourText: 'Let flesh rot and bubble at the touch of thine blades.' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: Gambit Spell (): If cast, friendly fighters' Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions have +1 Damage on a critical hit. This spell persists until the end of the round.

cards.name: Blessing of Rust
cards.colourText: Even the finest metals must eventually rust and flake away.
cards.rulesText: Choose one enemy fighter adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. The chosen fighter's Defence characteristic is . This effect persists until the chosen fighter is taken out of action.

cards.name: Fecund Vigour
cards.colourText: 'Thank you great Nurgle for these bountiful blessings!' - Ghulgoch
cards.rulesText: You can re-roll one attack dice in friendly fighters' attack rolls. This effect persists until after the next Attack action made by a friendly fighter, the end of the round or you play another Cycle ploy.

cards.name: Gift of Contagion
cards.colourText: It is hard to swing a blade when you are so sick you can barely lift it.
cards.rulesText: Gambit Spell (): If cast, choose one enemy fighter within 3 hexes of the caster.-1 Damage (to a minimum of 1) from the chosen fighter's Attack actions. This spell persists until the end of the round or the chosen fighter is taken out of action.

cards.name: Nauseous Revulsion
cards.colourText: 'Oh Mork save us, dat just ain't right!' - Morgok
cards.rulesText: -1 Dice (to a minimum of 1) from Attack actions made by enemy fighters adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. This effect persists until the end of the round or you play another Cycle ploy.

cards.name: Rampant Disease
cards.colourText: Merely standing in the presence of one blessed by Nurgle is enough to contract sevenfold sicknesses.
cards.rulesText: Roll one attack dice for each enemy fighter adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. For each roll of that enemy fighter is dealt 1 damage.

cards.name: Rancid Visitations
cards.colourText: 'The very air curdles in my lungs, the blood thickens in my veins. Back, my sisters, before it is too late!' - Morgwaeth the Bloodied
cards.rulesText: Gambit Spell (): If cast, each enemy fighter adjacent to the caster is dealt 1 damage.

cards.name: Steady Advance
cards.colourText: Tireless trudge the chosen of Nurgle, relentless as a wasting plague.
cards.rulesText: Choose up to two friendly fighters and push each chosen fighter 1 hex.

cards.name: The Burgeoning
cards.colourText: Rancid blubber spills forth to re-knit rent flesh and muscle.
cards.rulesText: Heal (1) the first friendly fighter that moves, is placed, pushed or driven back into a lethal hex. That fighter is not dealt damage from the lethal hex. This effect persists until a friendly fighter is healed in this way or you play another Cycle ploy.

cards.name: Unnatural Vitality
cards.colourText: 'Feel the feverblight quickening, oh children of the Grandfather, and give praise!' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: +1 Move to friendly fighters. This effect persists until the end of the round or you play another Cycle ploy.

cards.name: Fly Swarm
cards.colourText: Bloated black bodies fill the air around Nurgle's chosen warriors, making it impossible for marksmen to pick them off at range.
cards.rulesText: -1 Dice (to a minimum of 1) from Attack actions with a Range of 3 or more that target this fighter.

cards.name: Foetid Shroud
cards.colourText: This pestiferous wrapping ensnares even the sharpest blade like a sucking quagmire.
cards.rulesText: You can re-roll one dice in this fighter's defence rolls.

cards.name: Hulking Physique
cards.colourText: Some Blightkings are so monstrously bloated with power that they would make an ogor look scrawny by comparison.
cards.rulesText: -1 Move (to a minimum of 0)

cards.name: Living Plague
cards.colourText: 'Boss! It went in my mouth... I don't feel so good...' - Stabbit
cards.rulesText: Reaction: After an enemy fighter's successful Range 1 Attack action that targets this fighter, roll one defence dice. On a roll of or that enemy fighter is dealt 1 damage.

cards.name: Pestilent Deliverer
cards.colourText: Like an avalanche of filth down a rancid mountainside...
cards.rulesText: This fighter's Attack actions made as part of a Charge action have Cleave.

cards.name: Putrid Vomit
cards.colourText: 'Hwgh... huh... huh... HWEEEAAAAGH!' - Ghulgoch

cards.name: Stolid Bulk
cards.colourText: 'Come little foe, try to move me.' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: This fighter cannot be driven back.

cards.name: Unstoppable Tread
cards.colourText: 'The rasp of blades through flesh, the crunch of rotting bone underfoot. Ah, yes, today is a good day! Now come, onward!' - Sepsimus
cards.rulesText: Reaction: After this fighter's activation, push this fighter 1 hex.

cards.name: Virulent Blade
cards.colourText: So thickly does this weapon seethe with diseases that their constant squirming makes a wet slithering sound upon the wind.
cards.rulesText: You can re-roll one attack dice in this fighter's attack rolls for Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions.

cards.name: Retchling
cards.colourText: 'Now now, sweet Retchling, no need to fuss. They'll be part of Nurgle's garden soon enough.' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: Each time this fighter attempts to cast a spell, after the casting roll, you can change one of the symbols rolled to . In addition, this fighter cannot be dealt damage by backlash.

cards.name: Beast Armour
cards.colourText: Like a beast's leathery hide this enchantment resists the blades and bolts of the foe.
cards.rulesText: Gambit Spell (): If cast, you can re-roll one dice in the caster's defence rolls. This spell persists until the end of the round or until the caster is out of action.

cards.name: Collapse
cards.colourText: 'Scatter ladz, da roof's comin' down!' - Rippa Narkbad
cards.rulesText: Pick three edge hexes in a single group with each hex in the group adjacent to at least one other hex in the group, and all in one player's territory. Each fighter in a hex you picked is dealt 1 damage.

cards.name: Crushing Charge
cards.colourText: This headlong charge connects with the force of a stampeding rhinox.
cards.rulesText: In the next activation, you can take the following reaction once.

cards.name: Flash of Foresight
cards.colourText: A moment's inspiration can change the face of an entire battle.
cards.rulesText: Pick one:

cards.name: Irresistible Vision
cards.colourText: 'So... shiny... ' - Rippa Narkbad
cards.rulesText: Gambit Spell (): If cast, push each other fighter within 2 hexes of the caster up to 1 hex, or up to 2 hexes if that other fighter is a Hunter.

cards.name: Leadbone Dust
cards.colourText: This unpleasant substance seeps through the pores on contact and makes its victim feel as though their skeleton weighs ten times what it should.
cards.rulesText: Choose one enemy fighter adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. Give the chosen fighter one Move token. In addition, Attack actions that target the chosen fighter have Ensnare. This effect persists until the chosen fighter is taken out of action, or the end of the round.

cards.name: Leave Nothing to Chance
cards.colourText: The greatest strategists do not react to the terrain before them, but instead change it to suit their needs.
cards.rulesText: Pick one feature token in a hex that contains a friendly fighter. Remove that token from the battlefield.

cards.name: Lucky Escape
cards.colourText: 'Oop! That was too close!' - Mean-eye
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this when a friendly fighter is dealt 1 damage precisely. That damage is not dealt to them.

cards.name: Nightmare in the Shadows
cards.colourText: Something stirs amidst the gloom, something from which even the staunchest must surely flee in unreasoning terror.
cards.rulesText: Choose one enemy fighter and push that fighter 1 hex.

cards.name: Amberbone Dagger
cards.colourText: A blade that strikes with the fury of a hungering avalanche.
cards.rulesText: If there are one or more in the attack roll, this Attack action has Cleave. If this Attack action takes an enemy fighter out of action, discard this card and gain 1 glory point.

cards.name: Barb-laden Net
cards.colourText: 'Get... this... thing... off me!' - Morgwaeth the Bloodied
cards.rulesText: If this Attack action is successful, give the target one Charge token and discard this card.

cards.name: Hunting Companion
cards.colourText: 'At first I thought it was my own shadow. Then it struck, and I knew that some malefic entity had attached itself to me. I only pray to Kurnoth it remains benign.' - Karthaen
cards.rulesText: Reaction: During this fighter's successful Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action in which you rolled one or more in the attack roll, after the deal damage step, the target is dealt 1 damage.

cards.name: Jared's Spirited Sphere
cards.colourText: *muffled thumping noises, barely audible snarls of fury* - Gristlewel

cards.name: Prey's Cunning
cards.colourText: Stay low, stay clear, stay safe.
cards.rulesText: This fighter is a Quarry. If this fighter is a Quarry, this fighter cannot be dealt damage by Gambits.

cards.name: Sprinting Charm
cards.colourText: Even the hardiest warrior cannot keep up such a pace forever.
cards.rulesText: +1 Move in round 1

cards.name: Substance Siphon
cards.colourText: At first, this ethereal transformation seems a blessing. Blades pass through the trinket-bearer's body as though they were smoke. Later, when the bearer begins to tatter away upon the winds, the true horror of this 'gift' is revealed.
cards.rulesText: This fighter's Defence characteristic is Dodge X, where X is the round number. Their Defence characteristic cannot be modified, and you cannot re-roll dice in the defence roll when this fighter is the target of an Attack action.

cards.name: The Scattered Tome
cards.colourText: 'There now my darlings, let us see what glopsome prize we have found.' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: If this fighter is surviving at the end of the third action phase, gain 1 glory point for each Lost Page upgrade this fighter has.

cards.name: Victor's Experience
cards.colourText: A bloody rite of passage...
cards.rulesText: This fighter is a Hunter.

cards.name: Carnivore's Senses
cards.colourText: How do you evade that which knows where you will leap before you do?
cards.rulesText: The first Attack action made by a friendly Hunter in the next activation has Ensnare.

cards.name: Driven Onwards
cards.colourText: With the threat of the Everwinter at their backs and prey before them, the Beastclaw Raiders advance ever onward.
cards.rulesText: Choose one friendly fighter that has one or more Move tokens. Remove those tokens.

cards.name: Frozen Earth
cards.colourText: A swig of potion, a blast of chilling breath and soon nothing is left but cracked black ice.
cards.rulesText: Pick a feature token in a hex that contains or is adjacent to your leader. Remove it from the battlefield.

cards.name: Gnoblar Scramble
cards.colourText: 'Move, you little worms!' - Hrothgorn Mantrapper
cards.rulesText: Push each friendly Gnoblar up to 2 hexes.

cards.name: Gotcha!
cards.colourText: 'Wriggle all you like, little fish! You're on the spear now!' - Hrothgorn Mantrapper
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's successful Trap Launcher Attack action that does not take the target out of action. Give the target one Move token.

cards.name: Icy Breath
cards.colourText: Hrothgorn imbibes from a flask of shimmering, ice-blue potion and then vents a great blast of chilling breath.
cards.rulesText: Choose one enemy fighter within 3 hexes of your leader and roll one magic dice. On a roll of or the chosen fighter is dealt 1 damage.

cards.name: More Traps
cards.colourText: 'Heeehehehee... traps, traps, traps everywhere!' - Bushwakka
cards.rulesText: Pick one feature token in a hex that contains or is adjacent to a friendly Bushwakka. Flip that token.

cards.name: Near Miss
cards.colourText: Sometimes, trying to evade danger only leads the prey deeper into it.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this after a friendly Hunter's failed Attack action. Push the target 1 hex.

cards.name: Quick Snack
cards.colourText: 'Poor ol' Mean-eye. That monster didn't even chew!' - Rippa Narkbad
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this after an enemy fighter adjacent to your leader is taken out of action. If the enemy fighter's Wounds characteristic is 4 or more, Heal (2) your leader, otherwise Heal (1) your leader.

cards.name: Ravenous Fury
cards.colourText: The hungrier an ogor is, the more ferocious they become.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this after your leader's failed Range 1 Attack action. Your leader makes one Attack action.

cards.name: Desperate Parry
cards.colourText: It takes finely honed survival instincts and no little luck to survive for long around a hungry ogor, especially when you're three foot five.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: During an Attack action that targets this fighter, before the deal damage step, roll one defence dice. On a roll of or the combat sequence ends and this fighter is dealt no damage. Then discard this card.

cards.name: Famed Hunter
cards.colourText: 'Far and wide do they tell tales of my hunting skill. Want a demonstration? Well don't say I didn't warn you.' - Hrothgorn Mantrapper
cards.rulesText: You can re-roll one attack dice in this fighter's attack rolls.

cards.name: Hunting Beast
cards.colourText: 'The speed and savage instincts of the Frost Sabre make it one of the deadliest predators to menace the Mortal Realms.' - Osclephius' Ghurish Bestiary, vol. VII
cards.rulesText: Reaction: After this fighter's successful Attack action, pick one:

cards.name: Living Avalanche
cards.colourText: They say that only the very brave, the very stupid or those who have got their foot stuck in a mantrap stand firm in the face of an charging ogor.
cards.rulesText: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions

cards.name: Massive Bulk
cards.colourText: Big, lumbering and nigh-impossible to kill.
cards.rulesText: -2 Move (to a minimum of 0)

cards.name: Plucky Pair
cards.colourText: 'Left a bit... nah, uvver left... what?... nah, dat way... well I dunno, yooz da one doing the runnin' about!... thassit, right, now take dis ya lanky git!' - Luggit and Thwak
cards.rulesText: Rolls of are successes in this fighter's attack rolls and defence rolls.

cards.name: Savage Instinct
cards.colourText: A predator knows that to kill their prey they must first be able to catch it.
cards.rulesText: This fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions have Ensnare.

cards.name: Scion of the Everwinter
cards.colourText: The sheer cold that radiates from Icebrow Hunters can be incapacitating to their prey.
cards.rulesText: Action: Give each adjacent enemy fighter one Move token.

cards.name: Toughened Hide
cards.colourText: Long enough on the trail weathers even the softest hides.
cards.rulesText: When this fighter is dealt damage, reduce that damage by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

cards.name: Veteran Hunter
cards.colourText: Hunting? They'd have written the book on it, if only they could write...
cards.rulesText: Action: Draw up to two power cards.

cards.name: Blindside
cards.colourText: 'Gah! Where did they come from?' - Ghulgoch
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this during an Attack action, before the attack roll. Push one friendly fighter up to 2 hexes so that they are a supporting fighter.

cards.name: Buried Instinct
cards.colourText: Don't think, just act!
cards.rulesText: Reaction: Play this during an enemy fighter's Attack action that targets a friendly fighter, before the attack roll. Give that friendly fighter one Guard token. If that friendly fighter is a Quarry, you can also re-roll 1 dice in the defence roll for that Attack action.

cards.name: Chain Attack
cards.colourText: 'Give 'em the ol' one- Err... the ol' one-two!' - Morgok
cards.rulesText: The first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has Combo.

cards.name: Dragged into the Darkness
cards.colourText: He was right behind me... right there...
cards.rulesText: Choose one enemy fighter that has one or more Move tokens. The chosen fighter is dealt 1 damage if that damage would take the chosen fighter out of action.

cards.name: Rocksnake Toxin
cards.colourText: This amber liquid petrifies the victim from the outside in, a nasty way to go.
cards.rulesText: Choose one enemy fighter adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. The chosen fighter is dealt 1 damage at the end of each action phase. This effect persists until the chosen fighter is taken out of action.

cards.name: Sudden Scarcity
cards.colourText: 'Jealous, is this place, and barren. The stones steal away our blood and give nothing of themselves in return.' - Karthaen
cards.rulesText: The next time an opponent spends any glory points to give a fighter an upgrade, they must spend 1 additional glory point to do so. This effect persists until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Unnatural Truce
cards.colourText: 'Maybe... maybe just a quick breather, eh ladz?' - Morgok
cards.rulesText: Draw up to two power cards. Each other player draws up to one power card.

cards.name: Vicious Beast
cards.colourText: It came out of the darkness, a whirlwind of gnashing fangs and lashing talons.
cards.rulesText: Place the scatter token on a lethal hex, then do the following twice. Scatter 1 from that hex: any fighter in the end hex is dealt 1 damage.

cards.name: Wildform
cards.colourText: Become the beast in altered form.
cards.rulesText: Spell: This spell is cast if there are two or more of the same symbol in the casting roll. If this spell is cast, +1 Damage to the caster's Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions, and they gain one or more of the following, corresponding to the symbols in the roll.

cards.name: Amberbone Spear
cards.colourText: Like being struck by a gargant's fist.

cards.name: Binding Chain
cards.colourText: 'Let's see you leap around now, you little worm.' - Hrothgorn Mantrapper

cards.name: Cryptic Companion
cards.colourText: A bargain with this strange being opens doors of consciousness that lead the way into Beastgrave's feral heart. This is not a pact to be entered into lightly.

cards.name: Finishing Blow
cards.colourText: 'And stay down ya git!' - Rippa Narkbad

cards.name: Hunter's Caution
cards.colourText: Never assume your prey is defenceless, and you will never be caught unawares.
cards.rulesText: This fighter is a Hunter. If this fighter is the target of a Quarry's Attack action, you can re-roll one dice in the defence roll.

cards.name: Mandibles of the Ur-grub
cards.colourText: With this totem comes the spectral power of the Ur-grub's shuddersome bite.
cards.rulesText: Reaction: After this fighter's successful Range 1 Attack action, Heal (1) this fighter.

cards.name: Quintok's Combative Cantrip
cards.colourText: Never could the magician Quintok be accused of not looking after number one.
cards.rulesText: Spell Action (): If cast, push one adjacent enemy fighter up to 1 hex, then give the caster one Guard token, then push the caster up to 1 hex.

cards.name: Terrifying Aura
cards.colourText: There are some things you just don't hunt...
cards.rulesText: This fighter is not and cannot be a Quarry. In addition, opponents cannot re-roll dice in attack rolls for Attack actions that target this fighter.

cards.name: Victor's Speed
cards.colourText: Trample the foe and leave them broken in your wake.
cards.rulesText: +1 Move

cards.name: Blessed Endurance
cards.colourText: 'Oh ho-ho! You'll have to try harder than that, little grub!' - Ghulgoch
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when an Attack action with a Damage characteristic of 3 or more targets a friendly fighter and succeeds, if the friendly fighter is not taken out of action.

cards.name: Blessings Three
cards.colourText: Thricefold are Nurgle's gifts bestowed, a tri-lobe of generosity.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if any surviving friendly fighter has three or more upgrades.

cards.name: Chosen Warriors
cards.colourText: 'Great Nurgle, accept these sacrifices and let thine plagues run rampant in their rotting flesh!' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Cycle of Decay
cards.colourText: From death, to rot, to plentiful fecundity, so turns the endless circle.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if you played two or more Cycle ploys in the preceding action phase.

cards.name: Faithful Reward
cards.colourText: The Grandfather, it seems, is pleased...
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter is Inspired.

cards.name: Fell the Faithless
cards.colourText: 'Unbeliever! You're good for naught but rotting!' - Sepsimus
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy leader is taken out of action.

cards.name: Nurgle's Garden Grows
cards.colourText: Belching spores and spewing filth, the blighted groves spill ever outward.
cards.rulesText: Hybrid: Score this in the third end phase

cards.name: Rotbringers
cards.colourText: Through vile sorcery are the unnatural plagues of Nurgle spread.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your warband successfully cast two or more spells in the preceding action phase.

cards.name: Sacred Tri-lobe
cards.colourText: 'See! The Grandfather's sigil is wrought in filth!' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds three or more objectives.

cards.name: Seeping Rot
cards.colourText: Once the rot sets in, it cannot be cleansed.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter holding an objective is the target of an Attack action and is not driven back, if that fighter survives.

cards.name: Spread his Blessings
cards.colourText: By daubing Nurgle's rune upon sites of power, you spread his influence ever further.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

cards.name: Strength of the Devoted
cards.colourText: 'By sevenfold-and-three, invincible are we!' - Sepsimus
cards.rulesText: Score this in the third end phase if no friendly fighters are out of action.

cards.name: Adaptive Strategy
cards.colourText: When on the hunt, it is important to be able to think on your feet.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if you have scored 5 or more hybrid objective cards.

cards.name: Addicted to Power
cards.colourText: Some will risk any fate, no matter how ghastly, to feel the gods' dark blessings flow through their veins.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter is dealt damage by backlash, if that fighter is not taken out of action.

cards.name: Arcane Arrest
cards.colourText: 'Not so fast, my little popling.' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's spell that deals damage to an enemy Hunter or Quarry.

cards.name: Arcane Expertise
cards.colourText: 'Waste not, want not.' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after an enemy fighter is dealt precisely enough damage to take them out of action by a friendly fighter's spell.

cards.name: Awesome Resilience
cards.colourText: 'Mortal hurts are as nothing to such as we.' - Sepsimus
cards.rulesText: Hybrid: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Frantic Exchange
cards.colourText: 'What the zog is goin' on?' - Morgok
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after a fifth or subsequent power card is played in the same power step.

cards.name: Master of Many Paths
cards.colourText: Transcendence awaits.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if there is a surviving friendly fighter who is a leader, a wizard and a Hunter.

cards.name: Perfect Match
cards.colourText: 'Faultlessly executed, I think you'll agree?' - Morgwaeth the Bloodied
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if you have scored 10 or more objectives.

cards.name: Sorcerous Volley
cards.colourText: 'Wither before the blights of the Grandfather!' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after the same friendly fighter's second or subsequent spell Attack action in this phase that targets the same enemy fighter.

cards.name: Always Moving
cards.colourText: For the Beastclaw Raiders, life lies beyond the next horizon and death is ever at their heels.
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Arm of the Everwinter
cards.colourText: Crackling black hoarfrost steals cruel and deadly about the feet of the Beastclaw Raiders.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when your warband removes a feature token from the battlefield, or flips a feature token.

cards.name: Boxed In
cards.colourText: 'Where ya gunna run, eh? Where ya gunna run?' - Quiv
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if there are three or more friendly fighters adjacent to the same enemy fighter.

cards.name: Butchering
cards.colourText: The crunch and hack of heavy blades fills the freezing air.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if there are more enemy fighters out of action than surviving enemy fighters.

cards.name: Dinner Time
cards.colourText: CreeeeeeakCLANG!
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter Moves into, is pushed into or is placed in the same hex as a friendly Trap model.

cards.name: Extra Crunchy
cards.colourText: It's important to make sure that you get enough iron in your diet.
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when your warband takes an enemy fighter with three or more upgrades out of action.

cards.name: Flush Them Out
cards.colourText: 'Hrreegh! Gnnargh grarl!' - Valreek the Tracker (Trans: These monsters herd us like panicked cattle!)
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately if your warband pushes an enemy fighter that is not adjacent to your leader, and after the push they are adjacent to your leader.

cards.name: Hunter's Feast
cards.colourText: 'I'll chew your flesh and crunch your bones, every last one of you!' - Hrothgorn Mantrapper
cards.rulesText: Surge, Dual: Score this immediately

cards.name: Momentarily Sated
cards.colourText: 'Urrrrp.' - Hrothgorn Mantrapper
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if all enemy fighters are out of action.

cards.name: Surprising Competence
cards.colourText: 'I know, yeh? I even surprised meself!' - Bushwakka
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when a friendly Gnoblar's Attack action takes an enemy fighter out of action.

cards.name: Top of the Food Chain
cards.colourText: Ghur is a realm of apex predators, each waiting to devour one another that they might prove their primacy.
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if your leader is the only surviving leader.

cards.name: Unexpected Cunning
cards.colourText: 'They're savages! How are they doing this?' - Kyrssa
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after playing your third or subsequent power card in the same phase.

cards.name: Against the Wall
cards.colourText: 'Pinned 'em there fer later!' - Quiv
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter in an edge hex is taken out of action.

cards.name: Aggressive Strategy
cards.colourText: 'Hit them hard and keep hitting them. Don't give your prey a chance to recover their wits.' - Hrothgorn Mantrapper
cards.rulesText: Score this in an end phase if you have scored 5 or more surge objective cards.

cards.name: Blaze a Trail
cards.colourText: 'Spread... out. Take... all.' - Korsh 'the Sneak'
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if each surviving friendly fighter is in enemy territory and adjacent to no enemy fighters.

cards.name: Rising Power
cards.colourText: 'Feel the flood-tide flow thick and strong!' - Fecula Flyblown
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter casts a spell and you rolled three or more dice in the casting roll.

cards.name: Skilled Duellist
cards.colourText: Parry, parry, thrust, parry, strike!
cards.rulesText: Surge: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful Attack action made as a reaction to that fighter's Attack action with Combo.

cards.name: Team Effort
cards.colourText: 'Come Kyrssa, let us end this together.' - Lethyr
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Triumphant Hunt
cards.colourText: 'Pile them all upon the altar, Khaine smiles on us this day!' - Morgwaeth
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Uncontested
cards.colourText: Sweep the enemy aside with contemptuous ease.
cards.rulesText: Dual: Score this in an end phase

cards.name: Unexpected Pitfall
cards.colourText: 'Aaaaaaaaaa...' - Stabbit
cards.rulesText: Surge, Hybrid: Score this immediately
